Sentence: Xi Jinping met with Li Qiang to discuss national economic policies.
Xi Jinping consulted Wang Yi on foreign policy matters.
Xi Jinping visited the Great Hall of the People to host an international summit.
Xi Jinping inspected troops during a parade at Tiananmen Square.
Xi Jinping held talks with Vladimir Putin to strengthen bilateral ties.
Xi Jinping spoke with Joe Biden on strategic stability and trade.
Xi Jinping met with Kim Jong Un in Pyongyang to discuss regional security.
Xi Jinping visited Shanghai to meet international business leaders.
Xi Jinping addressed BRICS leaders during a summit in Johannesburg.
Xi Jinping attended the G20 summit in Rio de Janeiro and announced measures to support the Global South.
